page.title: 09 SCHOOLS
page.content: The area is served by 3 Primary Schools,{Cherry Tree County Primary, {St. Lawrence E. Donyland C. of E. {Cont. Primary, Rowhedge}and{ {Fingringhoe C.of.E Aided Primary. {Cherry Tree is}the newest and largest School taking as its catchment area Blackheath and Berechurch which are mostly Army families. It has approx. 235 pupils and was built in l978. St. Lawrence E. Donyland serves Rowhedge and was built in l862. At present the School in on two sites and has ll5 pupils. Fingringhoe School has two classrooms, l7 infants and l7 juniors. Each School serves dinners and takes part in inter-school sports and games.In Rowhedge there is a very active Playgroup for children from two to five.
